action_plans.name: Testing Action Plan
action_plans.task: Send a testing email with subject 'hello this is action plan testing' to sales-ai-agent@cyfuture.com

action_plans.name: Follow-up on Sent Emails
action_plans.task: Fetch emails from sent items folder, filter those that require follow-up and haven't been responded to, and send a follow-up email every 6 minutes

action_plans.name: Unread Email Response
action_plans.task: Check for unread emails every 2 minutes. If the email is from @cyfuture.com, draft a professional reply stating that the recipient is on leave and can be reached through their supervisor Animesh Anand. For emails from outside @cyfuture.com, send a usual response.

action_plans.name: GPU Content Summary
action_plans.task: Fetch Cyfuture web content containing 'gpu' every 10 minutes and send a comprehensive summary to jayant.verma@cyfuture.com

action_plans.name: Follow-up on Test Email
action_plans.task: Send a follow-up email to Jayant every minute until he replies to the test email

action_plans.name: Follow-up Emails for New Prospect
action_plans.task: Send follow-up emails to new.prospect@example.com every 6 minutes until prospect requests no further follow-ups or replies.
action_plans.stopping_condition: Stop when customer replies or requests no further follow-ups

action_plans.name: VIP Follow-ups
action_plans.task: Find unreplied emails from VIP customers older than 2 days and draft polite follow-up emails

action_plans.name: Test Mail Automation
action_plans.task: Send a test mail to jayant.verma@cyfuture.com

action_plans.name: Follow-up on Introductory Email
action_plans.task: Send a follow-up email to jayant.verma@cyfuture.com every 10 minutes
action_plans.stopping_condition: Stop after 10 executions OR when customer replies

action_plans.name: Follow-up on GPU and CPU Pricing
action_plans.task: Follow up with jayant.verma@cyfuture.com on the GPU and CPU pricing email every 10 minutes
action_plans.stopping_condition: Stop after 1 hour or when customer replies
